sentences.sContent: You can’t ignore the fact that many criminals never go to prison.
sentences.sCn: 你不能无视很多罪犯从未获刑的事实。

sentences.sContent: problems which we can’t afford to ignore
sentences.sCn: 我们不能置之不理的问题

remMethod.val: ig + nore(看做nose， 鼻子) → 翘起鼻子不理人 → 不理

words.tran: 忽略；不顾（ignore的过去分词）；不理会

trans.tranOther: to deliberately pay no attention to something that you have been told or that you know about
